Item.Items: insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '00', '基本工资', '2', '3', '标准薪资*0.35', '{bzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxz}* 0.35 ', 0, null, null, null, null, '0', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID','@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('15-07-2010 16:08:27', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '01', '保密津贴', '2', '3', '标准薪资*0.1', '{bzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxz}* 0.1 ', 0, null, null, null, null, '0', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('15-07-2010 16:10:11', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '03', '岗位工资', '2', '3', '标准薪资*0.3', '{bzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxz}* 0.3 ', 0, null, null, null, null, '0', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 14:56:38', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '04', '绩效奖金', '3', '3', ' SELECT SUM ( 员工加扣款.项目金额 ) FROM 员工加扣款 WHERE 员工加扣款.系统来源 = 2', ' SELECT SUM ( T_HR_EMPLOYEEADDSUM.PROJECTMONEY ) FROM T_HR_EMPLOYEEADDSUM WHERE T_HR_EMPLOYEEADDSUM.SYSTEMTYPE = 2 ', 0, null, null, null, null, '0', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('28-08-2010 17:02:55', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '05', '值班津贴', '1', '1', null, null, 0, null, null, null, null, '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 17:23:19', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '06', '个人社保负担', '2', '3', ' SELECT 社保记录.个人交缴合计 FROM 社保记录 ', 'SELECT T_HR_PENSIONDETAIL.TOTALPERSONCOST FROM T_HR_PENSIONDETAIL ', 0, null, null, null, null, '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 20:17:03', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '07', '地区差异补贴', '2', '3', null, null, 0, '员工月薪', 'T_HR_EMPLOYEESALARYRECORD', '地区差异补贴', 'AREADIFALLOWANCE', '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 16:27:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '08', '住房公积金扣款', '2', '3', ' SELECT 社保记录.住房公积金单位缴 FROM 社保记录 ', 'SELECT T_HR_PENSIONDETAIL.HOUSINGFUNDCOMPANYCOST FROM T_HR_PENSIONDETAIL ', 0, null, null, null, null, '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 20:21:24', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '09', '纳税系数', '2', '3', ' SELECT 薪资方案定义.纳税系数 FROM 薪资方案定义 LEFT JOIN 员工薪资档案 ON 员工薪资档案.SALARYSOLUTIONID = 薪资方案定义.SALARYSOLUTIONID ', 'SELECT T_HR_SALARYSOLUTION.TAXESCOSTRATE FROM T_HR_SALARYSOLUTION LEFT JOIN T_HR_SALARYARCHIVE ON T_HR_SALARYARCHIVE.SALARYSOLUTIONID = T_HR_SALARYSOLUTION.SALARYSOLUTIONID ', 0, null, null, null, null, '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 20:50:03', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '10', '扣税基数', '2', '3', ' SELECT 薪资方案定义.纳税基数 FROM 薪资方案定义 LEFT JOIN 员工薪资档案 ON 员工薪资档案.SALARYSOLUTIONID = 薪资方案定义.SALARYSOLUTIONID ', 'SELECT T_HR_SALARYSOLUTION.TAXESBASIC FROM T_HR_SALARYSOLUTION LEFT JOIN T_HR_SALARYARCHIVE ON T_HR_SALARYARCHIVE.SALARYSOLUTIONID = T_HR_SALARYSOLUTION.SALARYSOLUTIONID ', 3500, null, null, null, null, '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 20:55:33', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '11', '餐费补贴', '1', '1', null, null, 100, null, null, null, null, '0', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 16:18:57', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '12', '加班费', '2', '3', ' SELECT (round((标准薪资/月度考勤结算.应出勤天数(计划)* 月度结算.加班累计天数),2) ) FROM 月度结算 ', 'SELECT ( round(({bzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxz}/ T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.NEEDATTENDDAYS * T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.OVERTIMESUMDAYS ),2)) FROM T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE ', 0, null, null, null, 'OVERTIME', '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 16:15:37', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '13', '其它代扣款', '2', '3', ' SELECT SUM ( 员工加扣款.项目金额 ) FROM 员工加扣款 WHERE 员工加扣款.系统来源 = 1', 'SELECT SUM ( T_HR_EMPLOYEEADDSUM.PROJECTMONEY ) FROM T_HR_EMPLOYEEADDSUM WHERE T_HR_EMPLOYEEADDSUM.SYSTEMTYPE = 1', 0, null, null, null, null, '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('12-08-2010 20:31:13', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '14', '其它加扣款', '2', '3', ' SELECT SUM ( 员工加扣款.项目金额 ) FROM 员工加扣款 WHERE 员工加扣款.系统来源 = 0', 'SELECT SUM ( T_HR_EMPLOYEEADDSUM.PROJECTMONEY ) FROM T_HR_EMPLOYEEADDSUM WHERE T_HR_EMPLOYEEADDSUM.SYSTEMTYPE = 0', 0, null, null, null, null, '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 19:53:37', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '15', '固定收入合计', '1', '3', '标准薪资+地区差异补贴+餐费补贴', '{bzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxzbzxz}+ [地区差异补贴]+ [餐费补贴]', 0, null, null, null, null, '0', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 17:20:41', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '16', '缺勤天数', '2', '3', ' SELECT ( 月度考勤结算.应出勤天数(计划) - 月度考勤结算.应出勤天数 + 月度考勤结算.事假天数 + 月度考勤结算.旷工天数 *3) FROM 月度考勤结算 ', ' SELECT ( T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.NEEDATTENDDAYS - T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.REALNEEDATTENDDAYS + T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.AFFAIRLEAVEDAYS + T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.ABSENTDAYS * 3 ) FROM T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE ', 0, null, null, null, null, '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@UPDATEUSERID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 15:50:46', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '17', '假期其它扣款', '2', '3', ' SELECT - (餐费补贴 / 月度考勤结算.应出勤天数(计划) * (月度考勤结算.婚假天数 + 月度考勤结算.丧假天数 + 月度考勤结算.路程假天数 + 月度考勤结算.产假天数 + 月度考勤结算.看护假天数 + 月度考勤结算.产前检查假天数) + (CASE WHEN 年度考勤结算.病假天数 <= 12 THEN (CASE WHEN 月度考勤结算.病假天数 <= 1 THEN 0 ELSE (固定收入合计) / 月度考勤结算.应出勤天数(计划) * (月度考勤结算.病假天数 - 1) * 0.2 END) ELSE (CASE WHEN 月度考勤结算.病假天数 <= 1 THEN 0 ELSE (CASE WHEN 月度考勤结算.在职总月份数 <= 36 THEN (固定收入合计) / 月度考勤结算.应出勤天数(计划) * (月度考勤结算.病假天数 - 1) * 0.6 ELSE (固定收入合计) / 月度考勤结算.应出勤天数(计划) * (月度考勤结算.病假天数 - 1) * 0.4 END) END) END)) FROM 月度考勤结算 LEFT JOIN 年度考勤结算 ON 月度考勤结算.EMPLOYEEID = 年度考勤结算.EMPLOYEEID AND 月度考勤结算.结算年份 = 年度考勤结算.结算年份 ', ' SELECT -([餐费补贴] / T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.NEEDATTENDDAYS * (T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.MARRYDAYS + T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.FUNERALLEAVEDAYS + T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.TRIPDAYS + T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.MATERNITYLEAVEDAYS + T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.NURSESDAYS + T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.PRENATALCARELEAVEDAYS) + (CASE WHEN T_HR_ATTENDYEARLYBALANCE.SICKLEAVEDAYS <= 12 THEN (CASE WHEN T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.SICKLEAVEDAYS <= 1 THEN 0 ELSE ([固定收入合计]) / T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.NEEDATTENDDAYS * (T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.SICKLEAVEDAYS - 1) * 0.2 END) ELSE (CASE WHEN T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.SICKLEAVEDAYS <= 1 THEN 0 ELSE (CASE WHEN T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.WORKSERVICEMONTHS <= 36 THEN ([固定收入合计]) / T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.NEEDATTENDDAYS * (T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.SICKLEAVEDAYS - 1) * 0.6 ELSE ([固定收入合计]) / T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.NEEDATTENDDAYS * (T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.SICKLEAVEDAYS - 1) * 0.4 END) END) END)) FROM T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE LEFT JOIN T_HR_ATTENDYEARLYBALANCE ON T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.EMPLOYEEID = T_HR_ATTENDYEARLYBALANCE.EMPLOYEEID AND T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.BALANCEYEAR = T_HR_ATTENDYEARLYBALANCE.BALANCEYEAR ', 0, null, null, null, null, '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 19:18:52', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '18', '出勤工资', '2', '3', ' SELECT 固定收入合计-(固定收入合计)/月度考勤结算.应出勤天数(计划)*缺勤天数+加班费+值班津贴+假期其它扣款 FROM 月度考勤结算 ', ' SELECT (([固定收入合计])- ([固定收入合计])/ T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.NEEDATTENDDAYS * [缺勤天数]+ [加班费] + [值班津贴] + [假期其它扣款]) FROM T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE ', 0, null, null, null, 'WORKINGSALARY', '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 20:50:03', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '19', '税前应发合计', '2', '3', 'round((出勤工资+其它加扣款+绩效奖金)*100 , 2 ) /100', 'Math.round(([出勤工资]+ [其它加扣款]+[绩效奖金])*100 , 2 ) /100', 0, null, null, null, 'PRETAXSUBTOTAL', '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 19:55:55', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '20', '计税工资', '2', '3', '(税前应发合计)*纳税系数-个人社保负担-住房津贴扣款', '([税前应发合计])* [纳税系数]- [个人社保负担]- [住房公积金扣款]', 0, null, null, null, null, '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 20:52:28', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '21', '差额', '2', '3', '计税工资-扣税基数', '[计税工资]- [扣税基数]', 0, null, null, null, null, '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('12-08-2010 08:55:29', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '22', '税率', '2', '3', ' SELECT CASE WHEN (差额) <= 1500 THEN 0.03 WHEN (差额) <= 4500 THEN 0.1 WHEN (差额) <= 9000 THEN 0.2 WHEN (差额) <= 35000 THEN 0.25 WHEN (差额) <= 55000 THEN 0.3 WHEN (差额) <= 80000 THEN 0.35 ELSE 0.45 END FROM 薪资税率 LEFT JOIN 薪资方案定义 ON 薪资方案定义.SALARYSOLUTIONID = 薪资税率.SALARYSOLUTIONID LEFT JOIN 员工薪资档案 ON 薪资税率.SALARYSOLUTIONID = 员工薪资档案.SALARYSOLUTIONID ', 'SELECT CASE WHEN ( [差额]) <= 1500 THEN 0.03 WHEN ( [差额]) <= 4500 THEN 0.1 WHEN ( [差额]) <= 9000 THEN 0.2 WHEN ( [差额]) <= 35000 THEN 0.25 WHEN ( [差额]) <= 55000 THEN 0.3 WHEN ( [差额]) <= 80000 THEN 0.35 ELSE 0.45 END FROM T_HR_SALARYTAXES LEFT JOIN T_HR_SALARYSOLUTION ON T_HR_SALARYSOLUTION.SALARYSOLUTIONID = T_HR_SALARYTAXES.SALARYSOLUTIONID LEFT JOIN T_HR_SALARYARCHIVE ON T_HR_SALARYTAXES.SALARYSOLUTIONID = T_HR_SALARYARCHIVE.SALARYSOLUTIONID ', 0, null, null, null, null, '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('12-08-2010 19:12:11', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '23', '速算扣除数', '2', '3', ' SELECT CASE WHEN (差额) <= 1500 THEN 0 WHEN (差额) <= 4500 THEN 105 WHEN (差额) <= 5000 THEN 125 WHEN (差额) <= 9000 THEN 555 WHEN (差额) <= 35000 THEN 1005 WHEN (差额) <= 55000 THEN 2755 WHEN (差额) <= 80000 THEN 5505 ELSE 13505 END FROM 薪资税率 LEFT JOIN 薪资方案定义 ON 薪资方案定义.SALARYSOLUTIONID = 薪资税率.SALARYSOLUTIONID LEFT JOIN 员工薪资档案 ON 薪资税率.SALARYSOLUTIONID = 员工薪资档案.SALARYSOLUTIONID ', 'SELECT CASE WHEN ( [差额]) <= 1500 THEN 0 WHEN ( [差额]) <= 4500 THEN 105 WHEN ( [差额]) <= 9000 THEN 555 WHEN ( [差额]) <= 35000 THEN 1005 WHEN ( [差额]) <= 55000 THEN 2755 WHEN ( [差额]) <= 80000 THEN 5505 ELSE 13505 END FROM T_HR_SALARYTAXES LEFT JOIN T_HR_SALARYSOLUTION ON T_HR_SALARYSOLUTION.SALARYSOLUTIONID = T_HR_SALARYTAXES.SALARYSOLUTIONID LEFT JOIN T_HR_SALARYARCHIVE ON T_HR_SALARYTAXES.SALARYSOLUTIONID = T_HR_SALARYARCHIVE.SALARYSOLUTIONID ', 0, null, null, null, null, '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('12-08-2010 19:15:50', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '24', '个人所得税', '2', '3', ' SELECT CASE WHEN ((差额)*税率-速算扣除数) <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE ((差额)*税率-速算扣除数) END FROM 员工薪资档案 ', 'SELECT CASE WHEN ( ([差额])* [税率]- [速算扣除数]) <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE ( ([差额])* [税率]- [速算扣除数]) END FROM T_HR_SALARYARCHIVE ', 0, null, null, null, null, '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('12-08-2010 20:00:26', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '25', '考勤异常扣款', '2', '3', ' SELECT ((CASE WHEN 月度考勤结算.迟到次数 <= 3 THEN 0 ELSE (CASE WHEN 月度考勤结算.迟到次数 <= 5 THEN (固定收入合计) / 月度考勤结算.应出勤天数(计划) * (月度考勤结算.迟到次数 - 3) * 0.5 * 3 ELSE (固定收入合计) / 月度考勤结算.应出勤天数(计划) * (5 - 3) * 0.5 * 3 END) END) + (CASE WHEN 月度考勤结算.漏打卡次数 <= 2 THEN 0 ELSE (CASE WHEN 月度考勤结算.漏打卡次数 <= 4 THEN (固定收入合计) / 月度考勤结算.应出勤天数(计划) * (月度考勤结算.漏打卡次数 - 2) * 0.5 * 3 ELSE (固定收入合计) / 月度考勤结算.应出勤天数(计划) * (4 - 2) * 0.5 * 3 END) END)) FROM 月度考勤结算 ', ' SELECT ((CASE WHEN T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.LATETIMES <= 3 THEN 0 ELSE (CASE WHEN T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.LATETIMES <= 5 THEN ([固定收入合计]) / T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.NEEDATTENDDAYS * (T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.LATETIMES - 3) * 0.5 * 3 ELSE ([固定收入合计]) / T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.NEEDATTENDDAYS * (5 - 3) * 0.5 * 3 END) END) + (CASE WHEN T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.FORGETCARDTIMES <= 2 THEN 0 ELSE (CASE WHEN T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.FORGETCARDTIMES <= 4 THEN ([固定收入合计]) / T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.NEEDATTENDDAYS * (T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.FORGETCARDTIMES - 2) * 0.5 * 3 ELSE ([固定收入合计]) / T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE.NEEDATTENDDAYS * (4 - 2) * 0.5 * 3 END) END)) FROM T_HR_ATTENDMONTHLYBALANCE ', 0, '员工月薪', 'T_HR_EMPLOYEESALARYRECORD', '考勤异常扣款', 'ATTENDANCEUNUSUALDEDUCT', '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 17:15:46', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '26', '应发小计', '2', '3', '税前应发合计', '[税前应发合计]', 0, null, null, null, null, '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('11-08-2010 19:56:44', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '27', '实发工资', '2', '3', '税前应发合计-个人所得税-考勤异常扣款+其它代扣款-个人社保负担-住房津贴扣款', '[税前应发合计]- [个人所得税]- [考勤异常扣款]+ [其它代扣款]- [个人社保负担]- [住房公积金扣款]', 0, '员工月薪', 'T_HR_EMPLOYEESALARYRECORD', '实发工资', 'ACTUALLYPAY', '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('12-08-2010 20:32:48', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '28', '尾数扣款', '2', '3', ' SELECT 税前应发合计-(个人所得税+考勤异常扣款-(其它代扣款)+个人社保负担+住房津贴扣款)- FLOOR (税前应发合计-(个人所得税+考勤异常扣款-(其它代扣款)+个人社保负担+住房津贴扣款)) FROM 员工薪资档案 ', 'SELECT [税前应发合计]- ( [个人所得税]+ [考勤异常扣款]-( [其它代扣款])+[个人社保负担]+ [住房公积金扣款]) - FLOOR ( [税前应发合计]- ( [个人所得税]+ [考勤异常扣款]-( [其它代扣款])+ [个人社保负担]+ [住房公积金扣款]) ) FROM T_HR_SALARYARCHIVE ', 0, null, null, null, null, '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('23-08-2010 10:37:45', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))

insert into smthrm.t_hr_salaryitem (SALARYITEMID, SALARYITEMCODE, SALARYITEMNAME, SALARYITEMTYPE, CALCULATORTYPE, CALCULATEFORMULA, CALCULATEFORMULACODE, GUERDONSUM, ENTITYNAME, ENTITYCODE, ENTITYCOLUMNNAME, ENTITYCOLUMNCODE, ISAUTOGENERATE, MUSTSELECTED, REMARK, OWNERID, OWNERPOSTID, OWNERDEPARTMENTID, OWNERCOMPANYID, CREATEPOSTID, CREATEDEPARTMENTID, CREATECOMPANYID, CREATEUSERID, UPDATEUSERID, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE) values ('@SALARYITEMID', '29', '扣款合计', '1', '3', '个人所得税+考勤异常扣款-其它代扣款+尾数扣款', '[个人所得税]+ [考勤异常扣款]- [其它代扣款]+ [尾数扣款]', 0, null, null, null, null, '1', '1', '初始化', '@OWNERID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@OWNERCOMPANYID', '@OWNERPOSTID', '@OWNERDEPARTMENTID', '@CREATECOMPANYID', '@OWNERID', '@UPDATEUSERID', to_date('23-08-2010 10:41:03', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('@UPDATEDATE', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'))
